Pietro Passarelli

Assistant Producer - Making of the BBC 'Life and Death Row Series'

17 Jul 2014 | Duration: 6min 17sec Url

Behind the scene of the BBC3 'Life and Death Row Series'

Interviews with Assistant Producer of the BBC3 ‘Life and Death Row Series’, to gain an insight into the making of observational documentaries at the BBC, for the BBC Academy, College of Production.
